item.title: Getting started with android-ndk
item.description: Getting started with Android NDK with simple example # Using Android Studio 2.2 and higher Native Development Kit (NDK) you can use to compile C and C++ code. You can use NDK by manually downloading NDK and build it or through CMake . Here I will give process flow for manually install NDK and an example code, Based on your System OS you can download NDK from this location https://developer.android.com/ndk/downloads/index.html.
